name: Farm World
description: "Farm World" - makes the dream of your own farm come true.Create, design and maintain your own farm with up to 8 horse breeds, e.g. Haflinger, Arabs and Shetland ponies. But also typical farm animals like sheep, cows and pigs enrich your farm and make it an attraction with a high leisure value.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: x86 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8.1 compatible, 64 MB RAM, Pixelshader 1.1, Vertexshader 1.1 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
